nodes.position: 程序化营销解决方案 经理
nodes.description:
- 3年程序化广告投放实施经验，先后服务HP，SAP，小米等客户；
- 18年开始做信息流投放，日常管理日耗1千~100万的账户，期间积累了不同类型客户，不同推广目标的项目经验；
- 熟悉MP、广点通、巨量引擎、京东黑珑等广告平台的数据能力、投放能力、平台特性及实施细节，独立制定并执行推广优化方案；
- 从需求拆解到项目结案，全流程跟进客户推广诉求的落地，引导客户建立合理的推广理念和回报预期，并通过运营优化达成预期；
- 与策划团队、客户其他agency、数据及技术供应商等，协同参与到客户一方CDP、social CRM等营销自动化项目中；协助客户实现数据资产积累、投放效果追踪、人群洞察、数据营销再利用等

- Key Clients: Nestle (Super NAN, Nescafe, Dolce Gusto, Nespresso, 5 ram, milk stick, 8 cube, Pure life water, Perrier, Wafer etc.) Experienced in programmatic buying covering PDB operation, 
- DMP application, data integration and audience segmentation;
- Push the landing of Anti-fraud and Ad viewability monitoring of client's digital campaign, and maintain a continuous media performance alert. Plan, develop and execute programmatic buy of video ads from mainstream video website & app and display ads from DSP/Adnetwork. Engaged as the role of PMO in client's marketing related IT project such as first paty DMP, data center and data visualization.
- Support MS planning team and other agency counterpart to establish and achieve client's media goals.
- Campaign tracking and troubleshoot, deliver campaign reports with data analysis, conclusions and suggestions.
综合运用客户CRM，第三方广告监测、DMP及social数据源，通过对设定人群的媒体访问行为、品牌接触、社交媒体自然声量、社交用户行为的分析及挖掘，形成人群画像，综合输出包含人口属性、媒体偏好、品牌偏好、消费倾向及兴趣爱好等维度的品牌人群研究报告。
nodes.details:
→ 参与项目前期的需求沟通及方案设计；
→ 项目执行期间，与洞察团队沟通协调数据处理、报告框架搭建及分析维度设计；
→ 项目执行后期，负责报告交付、报告讲解及客户意见跟进；
→ 项目成功交付，与客户方市场、媒介及销售部门开展专题案例分享会并获得客户肯定。
nodes.name: 某快消客户品牌人群画像项目

nodes.description: Assist client to fulfill Global PCE (Personalized Consumer Experiences) vision and be data-driven marketing organization
nodes.details:
→ Configure customized audience segments for client's digital marketing activity 
→ Facilitate multi source (1st,2nd and 3rd party) data ingestion and coordinate docking between vendors
→ Manage tagging of digital media campaigns and deliver reports on DMP data validity.
→ First phase project delivered successfully by team work with client and DMP vendor.
nodes.name: First party DMP Project for a F&B Brand

nodes.description: Use CRM data, Ad tracking data, DMP and social data as input, through the analysis and mining of digital touchpoints (website visiting, brand contact and social media behavior,etc.), to form consumer profile containing multi-dimensional analysis on demography, media preferences, brand preferences, consumption propensity and personal interests of the audience.
nodes.details: → Successful report delivery and positive feedback from the case share conference with client's marketing, media and sales department.
nodes.name: Consumer Profile Project for a FMCG Brand
